subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Richardson scored 34 points and grabbed 9 rebounds, Gerald Wallace had 15 points and 10 rebounds, and the Charlotte Bobcats defeated the host Boston Celtics, 95-83, on Wednesday.
snippet: Jason Richardson scored 34 points and grabbed 9 rebounds, Gerald Wallace had 15 points and 10 rebounds, and the Charlotte Bobcats defeated the host Boston Celtics, 95-83, on Wednesday.
